pull.title: [wallet] [moveonly] Check non-null pindex before potentially referencing
pull.body: The once-a-minute `LogPrintf` in `ScanForWalletTransactions` will do a null-ref if it happens to hit the 60s mark right at the last block (where `pindex` becomes `null`). This was moved up to the top of the block instead, where the `while (pindex && !fAbortRescan)` has checked `pindex` for us.

events.body: utACK 6b816dc56b73025ca8fcb8b2a1e1dab8d18b4fd0. I am surprised there were no more bug report about that.
@kallewoof I would go with temptation and move the `GetTime() >= nNow` check to line 1554 as it is vaguely related to ShowProgress, this could help with readability too.
@mchrostowski Did you mean [1545](https://github.com/kallewoof/bitcoin/blob/6b816dc56b73025ca8fcb8b2a1e1dab8d18b4fd0/src/wallet/wallet.cpp#L1545) by any chance?

Concept ACK
@kallewoof Agree with the move to the top of the block.
